fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Kill a player at night.
- Force a player to only be able to type a or A the next day. (1 use)
- Make a target's role appear to be A upon death. The cause of death will be a random role that can kill. (1 use)
- Replace a player's feedback message with A this night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you kill or vote out a Unique player, Power, or Faction Head, you will gain a use for one of your limited-use abilities at random.
- You may multitask.
- Your Defense's tier is equal to the combined amount of uses remaining across your limited-use abilities. (Max: Invincible)
- This will look very funny if rolled by 1508.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all players who are against you.
